original_title: The Adventures of a Plumber in Outer Space
overview: A madcap science fiction comedy which is an affectionate homage to the British 'Confessions' films of the 1970's. Plumber Robin Evans gets transported to a distant planet by Queen Azzizaz, who wants him as her mate. Sergeant Zucker and Mrs Zucker also get transported to the planet, by mistake.
tagline: The Bawdiest Film of the Year - It Will Raise More Than Your Eyebrows!
title: The Adventures of a Plumber in Outer Space
